description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref: 21/3136/FUL dated 28.02.2023 to allow for design changes involving: amendments to refuse and cycle doors' width across Blocks 1-6, amendment to window types and handing across Blocks 1-6, added canopies across Blocks 1-4, removal of obsolete canopies below balconies in Block 6, amendments to rainwater pipes across Blocks 3-5, removal of columns in walkways in Block 5, removal of a railing on the roof of Block 5 and replacing with a parapet wall, amendment to the walkway downstand on the rear elevation of Block 6, increase in width of a window by half a brick and amendment of window type in Terrace 01, amendment to the window types for consistency across the terraces, amendments to front door finish to terrace 1-4 and front door finish to flat entrances on Blocks 5 & 6 and privacy screens to match metalwork on the respective block/terrace in Blocks 5-6 and Terraces 1-4.
